channel.title: Just need abit of help :)
channel.description:
1.i added a whip how do i make so it hits like a whip because it hits like sword and has no special?
2.whats the command to make ur self a npc not pnpc but if i type ::easter it turns me into a easter bunny etc?

item.title: Just need abit of help :)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“babushkahead, post:4, topic:469914”]when i hit a npc tho it doesnt hit like the whip does???[/quote]…

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:469914”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=587234.msg4167486#msg4167486 date=1353870129]
For the whip, you need to add them server sided, and make it return the correct emote. For the special, there might be an array to check what weapons have a special attack, add the whip ID to that list and give it its own special etc…
[/quote]
This can be done via CombatAssistant.java[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Just need abit of help :)
item.dc:creator: @babushkahead babushkahead
item.description:
@babushkahead wrote:

when i hit a npc tho it doesnt hit like the whip does???

item.title: Just need abit of help :)
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

X-J-K-X:

For the whip, you need to add them server sided, and make it return the correct emote. For the special, there might be an array to check what weapons have a special attack, add the whip ID to that list and give it its own special etc…

This can be done via CombatAssistant.java

Read full topic

item.title: Just need abit of help :)
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

::easter

        c.npcId = ID_FOR_BUNNY;
        c.isNpc = true;
        c.updateRequired = true;
        c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true);

For the whip, you need to add them server sided, and make it return the correct emote. For the special, there might be an array to check what weapons have a special attack, add the whip ID to that list and give it its own special etc…

Read full topic
